txt_en: Children see magic because they look for it.
txt_cn: 孩子之所以能看到魔法，是因为他们在寻找。

txt_en: Too much thinking about a thing prevents doing it.
txt_cn: 过多思考一件事会阻碍行动。

txt_en: Anything is possible with sunshine and a little pink.
txt_cn: 只要有一缕阳光和一抹淡粉，万事皆有可能。

txt_en: Cherish victories, use them, but don’t settle for them.
txt_cn: 珍惜胜利，利用它们，但别满足。

txt_en: You are wired for struggle, but worthy of love.
txt_cn: 你天生适合奋斗，但值得被爱。

txt_en: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
txt_cn: 心智能想到并相信的，就能实现。

txt_en: Successful, faster runs my horse in vernal breeze;I've seen within one day all flowers on the trees.
txt_cn: 春风得意马蹄疾，一日看尽长安花。

txt_en: It is never too late to fall in love.
txt_cn: 爱永远不会嫌晚。

txt_en: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
txt_cn: 生活是关于产生影响，而不是赚钱。

txt_en: You get in life what you courageously ask for.
txt_cn: 你有勇气要求，生活就会给予。

txt_en: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
txt_cn: 不要追求成功，而要追求有价值。

txt_en: Real wealth is when your kids hug you even when you have nothing.
txt_cn: 真正的富有，是孩子在你一无所有时依然拥抱你。

txt_en: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
txt_cn: 你不射门，就永远得不了分。

txt_en: No man is rich enough to buy back his own past.
txt_cn: 没有人富有到可以赎回自己的过去。

txt_en: Follow your heart, but take your brain with you.
txt_cn: 跟随自己的心，但要保持清醒的头脑。

txt_en: Life is more about giving than taking.
txt_cn: 人生重在给予，而非索取。

txt_en: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
txt_cn: 教育需要花钱，但无知也需要。

txt_en: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
txt_cn: 我放下现在的自己，我才能成为可能的自己。

txt_en: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
txt_cn: 幸福不是现成的。它来自你的行动。

txt_en: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
txt_cn: 我们太多人没有实现梦想，因为我们活在恐惧中。

txt_en: Shall I compare you to a summer's day?
txt_cn: 我能否将你比作夏天？——莎士比亚

txt_en: Life gets exciting when we face and beat challenges.
txt_cn: 迎接并战胜挑战，让生活充满意义。

txt_en: Same actions bring same results.
txt_cn: 重复旧行为，只会得到旧结果。

txt_en: Sometimes not getting what you want is good luck.
txt_cn: 得不到想要的，有时反而是幸运。

txt_en: The only way to avoid criticism is to do nothing at all.
txt_cn: 避免批评的唯一方法就是什么都不做。
